messages.subject: Re: Stretch Marks! :-)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/99 2:21:10 PM EST, faithb@afes.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/99 2:21:10 PM EST, faithb@... writes:

<< I was just wondering if anyone knew anything about stretch marks
itching! :-) I know it sounds funny but for the past few weeks mine
have, tremendously!!! >>

Faith,
Yes!!! I know what you mean, my stretch marks itched terribly also! I do
remember the doctor told me NOT to scratch them, as it would make the tearing
worse... Try some Vitamin E on your tummy. Blessings, Lori in TX

messages.subject: Stretch Marks! :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Anyway....... I have a question for all of you wonderful moms out there!!! I know this has nothing to do with unschooling per say but it does have to do with
messages.messageBody:
Anyway.......

I have a question for all of you wonderful moms out there!!!
I know this has nothing to do with 'unschooling' per say but it does
have to do with the process of getting those cute little bundles of joy
to unschool! :-)

I was just wondering if anyone knew anything about stretch marks
itching! :-) I know it sounds funny but for the past few weeks mine
have, tremendously!!! I was wondering if it had to do with the amount
of stretching I had to do with my last. I was absolutely huge when I
had her. She weighed 9lbs10-1/2oz when she was born. :-@
I don't remember itching so bad with my others.

Is this something I should contact my dr. about or is it normal?

Thanks for any info!
Living for Him,
Faith
